thread.title: Michelle Woodard
thread.title_full: Ingram's Water & Air Equipment reviewed by Michelle Woodard

author: Michelle Woodard
title: Michelle Woodard
text: I have had an excellent purchasing experience with Ingram's. I was very impressed with their customer service expertise and enjoyed Maurice taking care of every aspect of my inquiries and purchase. Thank you so much Ingram's, my Goodman AC unit is perfect for my home.
